::Hot Rod::

He dropped low, and summer salted towards Dragonfly. As he came by he
slashed at Dragonfly's leg with the saw. He was trying to make it hard
for Dragonfly to move. He did this with the sid of his boosters, so it
was fast, and would be hard to avoid.
